sentences.sentence: Sgt. Norwood complained that the article defamed him.
sentences.translation: 诺维德中士抱怨这篇文章诽谤他。

sentences.sentence: Or the associate professor who declared himself defamed when an external review committee found that he “does not appear to be meeting the standard for a tenured university professor.”
sentences.translation: 或者，一位副教授主张其名誉权受到了侵害，因为一个由校外专家组成的评审委员会认定，他“未达到一个大学终身教授的标准”。 做出这种评价当然是学术委员会的工作。
